label: A3B2_hP10_194_bf_ac-001
title: $\beta$-Be$_{3}$N$_{2}$ Structure
comments: This is the high-temperature structure of Be$_{3}$N$_{2}$.  Below 1270$^\circ$C $\alpha$-Be$_{3}$N$_{2}$ is in the cubic \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C6_cI80_206_a_d_e-001}{bixbyite ($D5_{3}$) structure} (Wriedt, 1987).
